item.title: Static page for conference deadlines
item.description: How to sync files between a Google Drive and a local directory: https://linovox.com/how-to-sync-google-drive-on-linux/ 1 2 3 4 # From Google to local rclone sync google: /path/to/local/directory #Â From local to Google rclone sync /path/to/local/directory google:
